meanings.definition: A type of small, red bean commonly used in Asian cuisine.
meanings.sent1: I cooked a delicious stew with adzukis for dinner.
meanings.sent2: Adzukis are a staple ingredient in many Japanese desserts.
meanings.sent3: The adzukis in the soup were so happy to be together.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were as red as adzukis after spending the day in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The sound of adzukis simmering on the stove filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: The plant that produces adzuki beans.
meanings.sent1: The adzukis plant requires plenty of sunlight to grow well.
meanings.sent2: Farmers harvest adzukis in the late summer months.
meanings.sent3: The adzukis plant waved in the breeze, happy to be outside.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of green, dotted with adzukis plants.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of adzukis flowers filled the garden with a sweet scent.

meanings.definition: The dish made with adzuki beans.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a bowl of adzukis soup at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: Adzukis paste is a popular filling for pastries in Japan.
meanings.sent3: The adzukis dish was so tasty, it disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of adzukis dish cooking made my mouth water.
meanings.sent5: The presentation of the adzukis dish was a work of art.
